stories.name: Fix Integration Tests
stories.notes: Integration tests fixed! All 9/9 tests passing (100%). Improved from 56% pass rate in Sprint 8. Root cause: CI/CD infrastructure fixes from Story 0 (Python 3.13 environment) resolved mock setup and dependency issues.

stories.name: Measure PO Agent Effectiveness
stories.notes: Generated 10 diverse test stories. Achieved 100% AC acceptance (exceeds 90% target). Avg generation time: 6.64s (95% faster than target). 90% escalation rate validates ambiguity detection. Production-ready recommendation.
